story:
After leaving behind the chaos of Greece, Kratos attempts to live a quieter life in the Norse realm with his son, Atreus. Following the death of his wife Faye, the two set out to scatter her ashes from the highest peak in the realms ‚Äî a journey that quickly becomes far more dangerous than expected.

As gods, monsters, and ancient forces intervene, Kratos must confront his violent past while teaching Atreus discipline, survival, and control.
